attributes.title: Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [], "type": "metrics", "params": {"axis_position": "left", "interval": "", "filter": {"language": "kuery", "query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.event_category : \"Alert\""}, "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "show_grid": 1, "type": "timeseries", "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "isModelInvalid": false, "time_field": "", "axis_formatter": "number", "series": [{"split_mode": "filter", "axis_position": "right", "filter": {"language": "kuery", "query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Activated\""}, "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "stacked": "none", "hide_in_legend": 0, "point_size": 1, "formatter": "number", "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)", "chart_type": "line", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "line_width": 1, "fill": 0.5, "separate_axis": 0}, {"split_mode": "filter", "axis_position": "right", "filter": {"language": "kuery", "query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Resolved\" or azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Succeeded\""}, "id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "stacked": "none", "hide_in_legend": 0, "point_size": 1, "formatter": "number", "color": "#68BC00", "chart_type": "line", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}], "line_width": 1, "fill": 0.5, "separate_axis": 0}], "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "axis_scale": "normal", "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "show_legend": 0}}

attributes.title: Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"title": "Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [{"type": "count", "enabled": true, "params": {"customLabel": "Alerts"}, "schema": "metric", "id": "1"}, {"type": "filters", "enabled": true, "params": {"filters": [{"label": "Activated", "input": {"language": "kuery", "query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Activated\""}}, {"label": "Resolved", "input": {"language": "kuery", "query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Resolved\""}}, {"label": "Succeeded", "input": {"language": "kuery", "query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Succeeded\""}}]}, "schema": "group", "id": "2"}], "type": "metric", "params": {"type": "metric", "dimensions": {"metrics": [{"accessor": 1, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "number"}, "type": "vis_dimension"}], "bucket": {"accessor": 0, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "string"}, "type": "vis_dimension"}}, "addTooltip": true, "metric": {"metricColorMode": "None", "invertColors": false, "useRanges": false, "style": {"fontSize": 60, "bgFill": "#000", "bgColor": false, "labelColor": false, "subText": ""}, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "colorsRange": [{"from": 0, "type": "range", "to": 10000}], "labels": {"show": true}, "percentageMode": false}, "addLegend": false}}
